title: Polkadot
body:
On my old Macbook Pro, I used to run a local node with a docker container. However, this approach is unusable on M1, so I need to find an alternative solution. I tried to build the node using Rosetta 2 but without any success.So then along with @JakPannik, we found a way how to run Substrate natively on M1.
 Update: I also managed to run Polkadot natively. The setup can be found at the end of this article.
